column2: "Oh, it's you. Glad to see you made it all of the way back here."
"Unfortunately for you, I'm a higher rank in the ARKS than you, so I'll ask..."
"Why did you come here?"
"1. To investigate this place."
"2. I don't have to tell you."
"Hm? Investigating? You really are outstanding. You and that research student."
"Haha! I guess you're right. You don't have to answer at all, do you?"
"That's a very ARKS-like response. But it's obvious why you're here. To investigate, correct?"
"Listen, in this world, there are nice lies. Lies for the benefit of others."
"The truth is not always the right answer. In life, there are some things that are better left unknown."
"That you've noticed something amiss here is noteworthy. But the truth is only half of it."
"So I'll let you in on one thing."
"This is the remains of a large battle from 40 years ago."
"That's right, these are not ruins as much as they are the remnants of that battle."
"The battle was a landmark one for the ARKS."
"Why the ARKS are hiding something, that is for you to discover."
"It is not a lie without purpose. I am not required to stay quiet about it, but there is good reason for it."
"There you are!"
"Hey! Stupid Maria! Don't leave me behind!"
"Hmph. What a stupid greeting, from a stupid girl. It's your own fault for being slow."
"What? Me? Slow?"
"Slowpoke. I'm going to call you stupid slowpoke girl from now on."
"Shut up, stupid Maria."
"Since Sara finally turned up, I guess our conversation ends here."
"We still have things to do, but nothing more to investigate. We'll take our leave now."
"The ARKS may be lying to you, but I am not. Think about that."
"Maria's confession"
"第８章 終わりの始まり"
